name: SeoulCeuticals Korean Skin Care 20% Vitamin C Hyaluronic Acid Serum + CE Ferulic Acid - Potent Anti Aging, Anti Wrinkle Korean Beauty 1oz
about_this_item: THIS KOREAN SKIN CARE VITAMIN C serum contains the same potent, active ingredients as more expensive CE Ferulic Serums
EXTREMELY EFFECTIVE - WE PROMISE you'll begin to see results with this K beauty product within 3 weeks when used daily
POTENT ANTI AGING, ANTI WRINKLE serum is proven to help reduce the appearance of wrinkles, fine lines & crows feet
THIS TOPICAL VITAMIN C ALSO helps to fade sun spots and is guaranteed to provide you with a brighter more youthful complexion
THIS FACIAL SERUM HELPS TO shrink pores, clear up acne, prevent breakouts, and minimize the appearance of acne scars & perfect under korean makeup

title: Wow great stuff.
content: I bought this serum in a whim and for the price I figured I'd give it a try. This serum works amazing ...All the redness around my mouth my nose under my eye corners all gone My skin looks so smooth and even toned. Try it it works great! Buy the two pack you won't regret it I only bought the one now I'm going to buy the two pack. I use it every night I probably use more than most people so it's not lasting that long
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Ever since applying this product I've noticed a more even, lighter, brighter skin tone. Less lines and wrinkles. I also love the smell! It's very pleasant. I feel I look more youthful and I've had multiple people comment on my skin. A little goes a long ways. Will purchase again.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2024

title: I'm a man and I'm getting compliments on my skin!
content: Skincare aficionados know what product this is duping.  And while I have been inspired by rave reviews to try the famous version of a Vitamic C Ferulic Acid serum, I just couldn't handle the price. So I tried this.  I put this on every morning under my sunscreen.  It has a nice, Vitamin C-ish smell, the consistency is good, the packaging protects the contents and I didn't see any ingredients I had a problem with.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I recently sampled a well know retinol cream, and unfortunately the strength was too much for me, leaving me with a big rough, discolored spot on my face. I believed that this Vitamin C serum might help. In addition,  I went back to a much milder version of retinol every other night, alternating with a barrier repair serum, and it seems to me that the three serums in combination are making the spot go away, fading my facial age spots a bit, besides diminishing fine lines on my face and neck and other sun damage on my hands (I always put whatever I am using on my face on my chest and back of hands). Overall, my skin is smoother and more even.  I have experienced no bad effects from this serum.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2024

title: Verified Purchase

title: Verified Purchase
content: Misleads you into thinking this product is made in Korea. It's made in US. It's modeled after Korean formulas, whatever that means. There are no % of individual ingredients listed on the label, so I'm thinking it has small amounts of different things. Perhaps because of that, it doesn't sting, has hardly any smell, and didn't cause an allergic reaction. Feels like putting water on your skin. The dark bottle prevents light oxidation. The dropper lets you use a tiny amount. I wash my face with Cerave salicylic acid wash 2%. After showering, I put 1 drop if Vit C on my cheeks, then use Cerave serum around my eyes, and Cerave pump moisturizer all over my face. I don't look younger after 3 months of daily use, but my skin has stayed clear. I stopped wearing makeup after COVID, so my skin was able to fully recover and looks great. I look much younger without foundation.  Makeup and/or brushes/sponges make my face break out with bumps. No longer.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024

title: Instant results - great skin food!
content: I think the best method is to put the dropper on your face, although I often will drop the serum in my hand and apply to my face that way, but some of the product gets wasted that way in my opinion and I end up using more drops than needed because it all drips between my fingers. It took me a bit of research to figure out where in the Korean routine this is incorporated. As I understand it, you apply it after your essence. I usually wait about a minute for the essence to get absorbed, then I apply this serum and usually wait about 15 minutes for my skin to absorb the serum completely. During that 15 minutes I just finish off drying my body from my shower, body lotion and getting dressed. By the time you've finished all that it's time to apply the emulsion, the next step of your routine. This works well if you have limited time in the morning, just continue getting ready while the vitamin c is getting absorbed, so you don't lose any time.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: It has a really nice citrus scent that's not too overpowering, and although it's a serum it does not leave a greasy mess on your face, your skin will absorb it well, and as someone else said drink it up.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2024

title: Very impressed!
content: This is a product I'll continue using because I see the results in such a short period of time, and I know the results will just keep getting better. Definitely recommend trying this. Oh, and for those who have said they have had breakouts from using this.... I can't stress enough that your skin needs to be thoroughly clean prior to using any type of serum, because otherwise dirt and dead skin cells just get trapped and you end up with acne. This is why I do the Korean skin care routine, because you initially do a double cleanse and your face is clean throughout the rest of the steps, and when you apply this serum you're applying it to a very clean face. Before doing the Korean routine I thought my face was getting a proper clean, but I was so wrong. I hardly ever get a pimple now! It's possible some might just be having a reaction to the serum (though it's not greasy and absorbs well), but just wanted to caution that you ensure your face is clean first before applying this.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: TOP TIP: With the exception of my cleanser I always gently press products into my skin rather than smearing them all over my face. I've noticed a big difference by doing this. Your skin absorbs them so much better. The products work as they're supposed to, skin is noticeably hydrated and stays hydrated for longer. It's like blotting a carpet stain with a cloth - you press the cloth into the carpet and it absorbs the liquid, and your skin does the same thing with products. Pressing is more effective than smearing the surface.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2024

title: Loved it until I received a rancid bottle
content: I was a little skeptical at first but decided to give it a go.  So glad that I did.  After two weeks of usage I am seeing a definite change in my brown spots on my face.  They have faded so much!  Give this a whirl.  It will not disappoint!!
